attributes.action: PROVIDE FREE PRESCRIPTIONS TO STROKE SURVIVORS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
STROKE SURVIVORS SHOULD HAVE A RIGHT TO FREE PRESCRIPTIONS.  WE ARE TOLD THE CONDITION IS LIFE THREATENING, AND THE GOVT RECOGNISE IT IS THE CAUSE OF MAJOR DISABLITY IN THE UK.  WE SEE DIABETICS AND PEOPLE WHO SUFFER FROM THYROID ALL GET FREE MEDICATION, WHY ONCE AGAIN ARE STROKE SURVIVORS DISCRIMINATED AGAINST,AFTER ALL WE ARE LEFT TAKING MANY PILLS TO SAVE US FROM FURTHER ATTACKS AND FURTHER DISABILITY.
LETS SEE HOW COMMITTED TO STROKE THE LABOUR PARTY ARE. OR ARE THEY JUST A DISTANT VOICE?

rejection.details: Please also rewrite in upper and lower case.
